resources.string: All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) was set up in November 1945 as a national-level Apex Advisory Body to conduct a survey on the facilities available for technical education and to promote development in the country in a coordinated and integrated manner.
Special Cell for Research and Coordination with State Govt. or UTs. and others coordinates and integrates development of technical education.
Invitation for Expression of Interest â€“ writing original Technical Text Books in 22 Indian Languages and English as well as Translation in 22 Indian Language

Exercise of Option for Prornotion under CAS as per AICTE Gazette Notiflcation datcd 05.03.2010 or 0l .03.2019 and Extension of Deadline to Acquire Mandatory Requirements for CAS Promotion till 3lst December 2024
